author: Kyle Barr
title: Now That Intel Is Cooked, Apple Doesn’t Need to Release New MacBooks Every Year
description: We may not see that inevitable M5 MacBook until next year, and that’s totally fine.
content: Covering tech news, you sometimes feel like the million-mile-per-hour footrace of Silicon Valley will inevitably result in a Wile E. Coyote-style calamity. Theres a part of me that craves a little mo… [+4031 chars]
